commandList:
!addrole - Specify one or multiple keywords to be assigned to the respective role/s.
!roles - list of all the roles available
!courseinfo - Enter the department/subject code/course number to retrieve a list of courses offered in Fall 2018.
!weather - Provides the weather of the city specified
!viewxp - View the total XP you have based on chat activity
